name: sign-service
description:
sign-service: Blockchain-Powered Document Integrity 
sign-service is a cutting-edge web service that brings the power of blockchain to document authentication. With a user-friendly interface, it allows you to:
✅ Upload and sign documents with ease 
🔗 Connect your Ethereum wallet seamlessly 
🔒 Store document fingerprints on the blockchain 
🕵️ Verify document authenticity instantly 
Secure. Simple. Blockchain-backed.

scripts.start: npm run deploy && npm run server

author: abdotop [github.com/abdotop]
